chat_log.message: Hello, how can I help you today?
I want to talk about my recent symptoms.
Sure, please go ahead and describe your symptoms.
I've been feeling very tired and have had a persistent cough for the past few days.
I see. Have you experienced any fever or difficulty breathing?
No, just the cough and tiredness.
Alright. I recommend resting, staying hydrated, and monitoring your symptoms. If they persist or worsen, please visit a clinic for a thorough check-up.
Thank you, I will do that.
